Load Change-O data
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
A small example Change-O tab-delimited database file is included in the 
`alakazam` package. 

```{r, eval=TRUE, warning=FALSE}
library(alakazam)

# Load Change-O file
file <- system.file("extdata", "changeo_demo.tab", package="alakazam")
df <- readChangeoDb(file)
colnames(df)
```

Calculates amino acid properties of regions
-------------------------------------------

```{r, eval=TRUE, warning=FALSE}
regions <- df$JUNCTION[1:10]
regionProperties(regions)

aacomp(regions[1])
```

```
cdr <- extractVRegion(df$SEQUENCE_IMGT, region=c("CDR1", "CDR2"))
translateDNA(cdr[1,1])
```
